Articles.Content: Hello, I'm trying to find a mod that was in a Modding Monday posted by Squad, but I can't find it for the life of me. I remember that it allowed engines to burn during time warp, allowing Ion engine burns to be much shorter. Can anyone remember what and where this mod is? Thanks in advance.

Right here. Next time you should post in general add-on affairs, FYI.
[url]https://kerbalstuff.com/mod/1147/PersistentThrust[/url]
Mod question moved to the mod subforum.
